head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WANGEMAN, FRANK G.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WANGEMAN, FRANK G.

block.p: WANGEMAN-Frank G. The international hotel executive who died May 22 from cancer at the age of 88 in his Santa Barbara, CA home. The staff and management of The Waldorf=Astoria extend their condolences to the family and friends of the consumate hotelier who devoted so much of his career to the hotel and to its parent corporation, the Hilton Hotels Corporation. Beloved husband of Marie and loving father of Alberta, Henry, Marie and Conrad. His long and distinguished hospitality career included associations with the world's greatest hotels. His contributions to the industry are myriad and will continue through the Frank Wangeman Scholarship Fund at the School of Hotel Administration at Cornell University, to which the family requests that remembrances be sent. Funeral, May 30, El Montecito Presbyterian Church, 1455 East Valley Road, Montecito, CA, 4:00 PM. Viewing May 29, WelshRyce-Haider Mortuary, 15 E. Sola Street, Santa Barbara. Eric Long, General Manager The Waldorf=Astoria
